projects.title: Almoosa Health Group Platform
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive healthcare platform with appointment scheduling, patient management, and telehealth consultations.
projects.challenge: Almoosa Health Group faced significant bottlenecks in patient throughput and data synchronization between their legacy HIS and patient-facing interfaces. They needed a unified digital ecosystem to manage appointments, inpatient records, and lab results securely.
projects.solution: We engineered a microservices-based architecture using NestJS to orchestrate data flow between the Oracle-based HIS and the Vue.js frontend. We integrated real-time notifications, VoIP calls using Zoom SDK, and AI-driven analytics to enhance user experience and operational efficiency.
projects.technicalDeepDive: The core challenge was synchronizing legacy Oracle databases with a modern, event-driven frontend. We implemented a Change Data Capture (CDC) pattern using Debezium to stream database changes to Kafka, which then consumed by our NestJS microservices to update the application state in real-time.

projects.title: International Medical Center (IMC)
projects.shortDescription: Healthcare ecosystem featuring Women’s Health App, Physician App, and Patient Portal.
projects.challenge: Creating a cohesive digital ecosystem for a major medical center that integrates various specialized applications for different user groups (patients, physicians, women's health) while ensuring seamless data flow and payment processing.
projects.solution: We developed a suite of interconnected applications including a Women’s Health App, Physician App, and Patient Portal. The ecosystem features telemedicine capabilities, health tracking, and AI-powered diagnostics. We also integrated Telr for secure payment processing and implemented virtual tours.
projects.technicalDeepDive: The system required robust integration with existing hospital infrastructure. We utilized Java Spring Boot for the backend services, deployed on Apache Tomcat, to handle the complex business logic and secure data processing required for medical records and payments.

projects.title: SolarAMPs Operations
projects.shortDescription: An all-in-one app for SolarAMPS team members enabling seamless project collaboration, time tracking, and productivity management.
projects.challenge: Field teams operated in remote areas with intermittent connectivity, leading to data synchronization issues and scheduling conflicts. SolarAMPs needed a 'local-first' mobile application that could maintain full functionality offline and sync seamlessly when connectivity was restored.
projects.solution: We built a robust Flutter application using a local SQLite database for offline persistence. We implemented a custom conflict resolution strategy using CRDTs (Conflict-free Replicated Data Types) to merge changes from multiple field agents without data loss when syncing with the Firebase backend.
projects.technicalDeepDive: The critical component was the synchronization engine. We utilized background fetch tasks to opportunistically sync data packets. To optimize bandwidth in low-connectivity zones, we implemented delta compression for image uploads, reducing data usage by 60%. The map interface uses vector tiles cached locally to ensure smooth navigation even without a network connection.

projects.title: Book Better Marketplace
projects.shortDescription: A modern salon marketplace app that connects users with beauty and wellness professionals.
projects.challenge: Creating a dual-sided marketplace (User & Merchant) required complex state management to keep availability slots synchronized in real-time to prevent double bookings, while also handling split payments and commission logic securely.
projects.solution: We developed two distinct Flutter apps sharing a common core library for business logic. The backend utilizes Firestore transactions to ensure atomicity of booking slots. We integrated Stripe Connect to handle complex split payments, automatically routing funds to merchants and commissions to the platform.
projects.technicalDeepDive: To prevent the 'double-booking' problem during high-traffic periods, we implemented optimistic UI updates combined with server-side transactional locking. When a user selects a slot, a temporary hold is placed in Redis. If the booking isn't confirmed within 5 minutes, the hold expires. This ensures high concurrency without data inconsistency.

projects.title: Ovasave Fertility Platform
projects.shortDescription: HIPAA-compliant fertility preservation platform migrated from WordPress to NestJS/Next.js.
projects.challenge: Migrating a sensitive healthcare platform from a legacy WordPress monolith to a secure, scalable architecture while ensuring strict HIPAA compliance and zero downtime during the data migration.
projects.solution: We re-platformed to a secure NestJS/Next.js architecture hosted on Azure Healthcare Cloud. We implemented a multi-portal system, installment-based payments, and courier tracking integration. The migration was executed using a strangler fig pattern to gradually replace legacy functionality.
projects.technicalDeepDive: Security was paramount. We implemented field-level encryption for sensitive patient data using Azure Key Vault. All API requests are validated against a strict policy engine. We also set up a CI/CD pipeline with automated security scanning (SAST/DAST) to prevent vulnerabilities from reaching production.

projects.title: Business in a Box - HR System
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive HR system for attendance tracking, grievance management, and workflow automation.
projects.challenge: The client faced inefficiencies in HR operations due to manual data entry and lack of automated tracking for attendance and grievances, leading to errors and administrative bottlenecks.
projects.solution: We developed a robust HR management system using Vue.js and NestJS. The system automates key HR workflows, tracks attendance in real-time, and provides a structured process for grievance management.
projects.technicalDeepDive: The system was containerized using Docker for consistent deployment across environments. We utilized PostgreSQL for reliable relational data storage and implemented complex SQL queries to generate attendance reports and analytics.

projects.title: Priseen Fashion Tech
projects.shortDescription: A next-gen fashion-tech app merging style and smart connectivity.
projects.challenge: Creating a seamless bridge between physical fashion items and digital social profiles using NFC technology, ensuring compatibility across a wide range of Android and iOS devices.
projects.solution: We developed a Flutter app integrating a custom native bridge for NFC interactions. We utilized Firebase Dynamic Links to handle deep linking from NFC scans, instantly redirecting users to specific social profiles or product pages.
keyFeatures: Instantly share social & contact info via NFC
projects.technicalDeepDive: The main technical hurdle was the variability in NFC hardware across devices. We built a hardware abstraction layer (HAL) within the Flutter app to normalize NFC read/write operations. We also implemented a cryptographic signature on the NFC tags to prevent cloning and ensure the authenticity of the fashion items.

projects.title: Aviso AI Analytics
projects.shortDescription: Interactive data analytics dashboard with real-time sales and pipeline reports.
projects.challenge: Visualizing millions of sales data points and pipeline projections in an intuitive, interactive format for C-suite decision makers, with sub-second rendering times.
projects.solution: Led a 3-member team in developing a high-performance Single Page Application (SPA) using Vue.js. We designed a dynamic report system and multi-dashboard management using Vue.js and D3.js to handle large datasets efficiently.
projects.technicalDeepDive: To optimize rendering performance, we implemented a virtualized windowing technique for the data tables and used canvas-based rendering for the scatter plots. Data aggregation was offloaded to a Node.js intermediate layer that cached pre-computed aggregates in Redis, reducing the load on the primary data warehouse.

projects.title: Seeloz AI Admin Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered admin dashboard with customizable data visualization reports.
projects.challenge: Creating a user-friendly interface for complex AI-driven supply chain data that needed to be embedded within an existing WordPress ecosystem while maintaining modern interactivity.
projects.solution: We developed a Vue.js application that mounts as a micro-frontend within the WordPress context. This allowed us to leverage modern state management and routing while keeping the content management capabilities of WordPress.
projects.technicalDeepDive: The integration required a custom communication bridge between the PHP-based WordPress backend and the Vue.js frontend. We used the WordPress REST API to hydrate the Vue application with initial state and implemented a JWT-based authentication flow to secure the API endpoints.

projects.title: Global Direct UI/UX
projects.shortDescription: Mobile-first layouts and security optimizations for major telecom brands like RedPocket.com.
projects.challenge: Ensuring top-tier security and responsiveness for high-traffic telecom websites like RedPocket.com, FreedomPop.com, and UnrealMobile.com, which face frequent bot attacks and require 100% uptime.
projects.solution: We designed and implemented mobile-first layouts using Bootstrap. We conducted security audits and performance optimizations, ensuring top-tier website security and responsiveness. We also hardened the PHP backend against common vulnerabilities.
projects.technicalDeepDive: We focused on optimizing Core Web Vitals. By implementing critical CSS inlining, lazy loading for images, and deferring non-essential JavaScript, we improved the LCP (Largest Contentful Paint) by 60%. We also configured a Web Application Firewall (WAF) to filter out malicious bot traffic.

projects.title: Book Better Merchants
projects.shortDescription: A dedicated app for salon owners to manage their digital presence on the Book Better marketplace.
projects.challenge: Empowering merchants with a simple yet powerful tool to manage their business on the Book Better marketplace, including staff scheduling, revenue tracking, and customer relationship management.
projects.solution: Built a dedicated Flutter app for merchants with a dashboard-centric UI. We integrated complex calendar management logic to handle staff shifts and shop hours. The app features offline support for viewing schedules.
projects.technicalDeepDive: The scheduling logic was the most complex aspect. We implemented a custom algorithm to calculate available slots based on shop hours, staff shifts, service duration, and existing bookings. This calculation is performed on the edge using Cloud Functions to ensure low latency and consistency across the platform.

projects.title: Bouncer - AI Privacy Guardian
projects.shortDescription: Chrome MV3 privacy extension that analyzes policies and network behavior to reveal data collection.
projects.challenge: Users are often unaware of the hidden data collection practices, third-party trackers, and complex privacy policies of the websites they visit, leading to privacy violations and digital fingerprinting.
projects.solution: We built a browser add-on that analyzes privacy policies and live network behavior to reveal data types collected and generate a per-site Trust Score. It features an in-page overlay UI and auto-rejects non-essential cookies where supported.
projects.technicalDeepDive: The extension uses a local Node/Express backend integrated with Gemini to process and summarize privacy policies. We implemented CSP-safe background fetching and SPA-safe gating to ensure compatibility across modern web apps. A custom caching layer with single-flight deduping ensures efficient API usage.

projects.title: Nexus Enterprise Data Platform
projects.shortDescription: Enterprise-grade data onboarding and streaming analytics platform handling 25GB+ datasets.
projects.challenge: The client needed to process massive datasets (up to 25GB) with high throughput (250K+ rows/batch) while ensuring data integrity, real-time observability, and efficient search capabilities for their analytics team.
projects.solution: We architected a Kafka/Flink pipeline with Schema Registry and DLQ/retry logic. We built a high-performance batch processing engine using streaming parsers and integrated a columnar analytics database alongside a relational store for hybrid workloads.
projects.technicalDeepDive: We optimized Elasticsearch by implementing index lifecycle management with custom n-gram analyzers, reducing query time by 30%. For reporting, we used SXSSF streaming to cut export runtime by 35%. The entire platform is monitored via JMX dashboards tracking lag and partition health.

projects.title: FinCore Banking Engine
projects.shortDescription: Modern core banking implementation with secure payment workflows and dispute management.
projects.challenge: Modernizing legacy JAX-RS services to a Spring Boot microservices architecture while maintaining ISO 8583 compliance for financial transaction messaging and ensuring strict security standards for payment processing.
projects.solution: We decomposed the monolith into domain-driven microservices, adding comprehensive support for Prepaid, Debit, and Credit accounts. We implemented a secure Investigation Case Dispute Management system and integrated ChatGPT API for developer support.
projects.technicalDeepDive: Security was the top priority. We implemented JWT authentication, encryption protocols, and certificate management. We also modernized the legacy services to Spring Boot with auto-configuration, improving startup time by 40% and enhancing operational stability.
